articles.title: 「Oracle Database@AWS」正式提供開始 これにより3大クラウドでOracle Cloudインフラを用いたデータベースが利用可能に

articles.title: リクルート、Indeedなど人材事業で1300人リストラ

articles.title: YouTubeの政党検索数で参政党が急伸 各党の割合や都道府県別の傾向を可視化

articles.title: TBS「熱狂マニアさん！」、BPOが放送倫理違反と判断 番組と広告の切り分けあいまい、「同じ放送局で繰り返し表面化」

articles.title: 「毎日新聞デジタル」で不正ログインか 約2万アカウントのパスワードをリセット

articles.title: xAI、Grokの“恐ろしい行動”について謝罪し、原因と対策を説明

articles.title: “睡眠リズムの乱れ”による経済損失、年間約1兆円――「ポケモンスリープ」が分析

articles.title: Outlookの通知音「デレレーン」が嫌い、優しめの音に変更する

articles.title: ChatGPT advises women to ask for lower salaries, study finds
articles.summary: New research has found that large language models (LLMs) such as ChatGPT consistently advise women to ask for lower salaries than men, even when both have identical qualifications. The study was co-authored by Ivan Yamshchikov, a professor of AI and robotics at the Technical University of Würzburg-Schweinfurt (THWS) in Germany. Yamshchikov, who is also the founder of Pleias, a French–German startup building ethically trained language models for regulated industries, worked with his team to test

articles.title: ‘Magical thinking’ to believe UK’s AI boom won’t derail climate goals, report warns
articles.summary: A new report from the University of Cambridge has warned that the UK’s push to lead in AI risks derailing its climate targets — unless urgent action is taken. According to the University’s Minderoo Centre for Technology and Democracy, the unchecked growth of AI could drive a 25-fold increase in the global tech sector’s energy use by 2040, putting massive strain on power grids and accelerating carbon emissions. Even the most conservative scenario suggests a five-fold rise over the next 15 years.
